    BucketSortedIndex<T extends Positioned>
    This class can be used to map items to item occurrences, for example literals to literal occurrences.
    BucketSortedList<T extends Positioned>

    ByteFunction<I>
     
    CombinationsIterator
    The iterator enumerates all combination of m integers as int[] of length n.
    Example: combinationsIterator(5,2) yields.
    [0, 1]
    [0, 2]
    [0, 3]
    [0, 4]
    [1, 2]
    [1, 3]
    [1, 4]
    [2, 3]
    [2, 4]
    [3, 4]
    In total these are m over n combinations.
